name: Custom Moko's Twitter Theme
description: I took Moko's theme and customised it to my portrait needs (with her help <3)

user.name: TheSound
user.about: I need this as stylish backup, since it doesn't save my sheets through Sync >:

css:
@-moz-document domain("twitter.com")
	{
		/*custom colors var(--bg)*/
		:root
			{
				--bg1: #373635 !important;
				--bg2: #242526 !important;
				--text1: #f7f7f7 !important;
				--text2: #aaaaaa !important;
				--accent: #f7f7f7 !important;
			}

		/*
		:root
			{
				--bg1: #383839 !important;
				--bg2: #060607 !important;
				--text1: #61BA61 !important;
				--text2: #4E954E !important;
				--accent: #61BA61 !important;
			}
		
		*/
		
		
		/* bg and text color */
		body,
		html,
		.ProfilePage .AppContent
			{
				color: var(--text1) !important;  
				/*background: url() !important;*/
				background: var(--bg2) !important;
			}
		
		.tweet
			{
				padding: 20px !important;
				background: var(--bg1) !important;
			}
		
		
		
		/* font */  
		body,
		p,
		a,
		div.DirectMessage-text,
		div.tweet-text.js-tweet-text,
		#tweet-box-global
			{
				/* font-family: "Segoe UI Semibold";
				font-size: 13px !important;*/
			}
		
		
		
		/* content bg color */  
		.module .flex-module,
		.DashboardProfileCard-content,
		.Trends,
		.tweet,
		.global-nav .search-input,
		.DashboardProfileCard-avatarLink
			{
				background: var(--bg1) !important;
			}  
		
		
		
		/* content & hover */
		.tweet:hover,
		.top-timeline-tweetbox .tweet-user,
		.new-tweets-bar,
		.new-tweets-bar:hover,
		.top-timeline-tweetbox .timeline-tweet-box .tweet-form.condensed .tweet-box,
		.global-nav-inner,
		div.profilecard-content,
		.dashboard-profilecard-stats,
		.DMActivity-container,
		.DMNotice,
		.DMActivity-header,
		.content-main .conversations-enabled .expansion-container .inline-reply-tweetbox,
		div.notie,
		.content-main .expansion-container > li:last-child .view-more-container,
		.dismiss-confirmation,
		.action-prompt,
		.stream-end-inner,
		.Trends,
		.module,
		.module .flex-module,
		.permalink .inline-reply-tweetbox,
		.btn,
		div.ProfileCard-content,
		div.ProfileCard.js-actionable-user,
		li.active:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1),
		.js-nav-links > li:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1),
		.js-nav-links > li:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1),
		.js-nav-links > li > a,
		.stream-item-favorited_mention,
		.stream-item-favorited_mention,
		.stream-item-retweet,
		#stream-item-activity,
		.modal-tweet-form-container,
		#global-new-tweet-button:hover,
		.button:hover,
		.content-inner,
		.StreamsTopBar,
		div.MomentGuideVTwoCapsuleSummary,
		.StreamsFooter,
		.message,
    /*New Lines*/
    .DMConversation-scrollContainer,
    .dropdown-menu,
    .modal-header,
    .modal-content,
    .ProfileCanopy-navBar,
    .ProfileNav-item--userActions,
    .ProfileHeading-toggle,
    .WhoToFollow,
    .ThreadedConversation-showMore,
    .RetweetDialog-commentBox,
		.js-activity-follow,
    .js-activity-retweeted_retweet,
    .js-activity-favorited_retweet,
    .js-activity-list_member_added,
    .js-activity-retweeted_mention,
    .js-activity-favorite,
    .ProfileCard,
		.DMActivity-body,
		.DMDivider,
		button.NewTweetButton,
		button.DMButton,
		.PollXChoice-pollWrapper,
		.TwitterCardsGrid,
		.social-proof-label,
		.DMPopoverMenu,
		.DismissibleModule,
		.ThreadedConversation-viewOther,
		.DMConversation-sendingStateIndicator,
		.permalink.light-inline-actions.stream-uncapped.has-replies.original-permalink-page,
		div.header-inner,
		#notifications-optout-all-top,
		.notifications-web-soft-prompt,
		.with-contacts-dashboard,
		.find-friends-sources,
		.muted-setting.js-actionable-user.account,
		.blocked-setting.js-actionable-user.account,
		.FacebookConnect,
		.content-main .stream-item,
		.ProfileHeading-content,
		.SummaryCard-contentContainer.TwitterCardsGrid-float--prev,
		.PollingCardComposer,
		.PollingCardComposer-optionInput.is-singleLine.is-plainText.u-borderUserColorLightFocus.is-showPlaceholder,
		.js-stream-item.stream-item.stream-item,
		.stats,
		.follow-bar.js-list-actions,
		.MomentCard.TwitterCard-container.TwitterCard-container--clickable.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCardsGrid-noColSpacing.u-block.js-openLink,
		.DMButtonBar,
		.FoundMediaSearch-query,
		.ResponsiveLayout,
		.PageContainer,
		.web-reporting-flow,
		/*Moments start here*/
		.MomentFloatingMenu.is-fixed,
		.MomentCapsuleItemTweet.MomentCapsuleItemTweet--withText.js-stream-tweet.js-actionable-tweet,
		.AdaptiveRelatedSearches,
		.btn.tweet-action.primary-btn.messaging.tweet-btn,
		.TweetBoxToolbar-tweetButton.tweet-button > .btn.primary-btn.tweet-action.tweet-btn.js-tweet-btn,
		.tfw.es.logged-in.ltr.nofooter.noloki.js div.bd span.field textarea,
		.SidebarFilterModule.is-collapsed.with-3-filters,
		.SidebarFilterModule.with-3-filters,
		.search.advanced-search
		 { background: var(--bg1) !important; }  
			
		.stream-items,
		input,
		textarea,
		div[contenteditable],
		.t1-select,
		.TweetImpressionsModule,
		.TweetImpressionsModule-xAxis,
		.MomentGuideNavigation,
		#page-container,
		div.thumbnail-container,
		button.DMInbox-toolbar,
		li.DMInbox-conversationItem:hover > *,
		.DMConversation-composer,
		.DMComposer-container,
		.EmojiBar-icon,
		div.DirectMessage-text,
		#global-new-tweet-button,
		#global-tweet-dialog > div:nth-child(1),
		.modal-tweet-form-container > form:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > button:nth-child(3),
		#user-dropdown > div:nth-child(2) > ul:nth-child(3) > li:hover,
		a.list-link.js-nav:hover,
		a.list-link:hover,
		.active > a:nth-child(1),
		.page-canvas,
		.mobile,
		.Streams-dividerText,
		.StreamsHero-image,
		.LoginDialog-body,
		.LoginDialog-footer,
    /*NewLines*/
    .UserActions-editButton,
    .user-actions-follow-button,
    .primary-btn,
    .new-tweets-bar,
    .TypingIndicatorMessageBubble-dotContainer,
		.FollowStatus,
		.FacebookConnect-actionButton,
		.content-main #apps-stream .stream-item .app button,
		.typeahead-item.typeahead-account-item.js-selectable > a:hover,
		.typeahead-item.typeahead-topic-item > a:hover,
		.js-selectable.typeahead-accounts-shortcut.js-shortcut > a:hover,
		.ProfileClusterFollow,
		.GridTimeline-footerIcon,
		.follow-bar.js-list-actions > a,
		.MomentFormatLink-anchor:hover
			{ background: var(--bg2) !important; }		
		
		/* text color */
		body,
		p,
		a,
		div.DirectMessage-text,
		.Trends .context-trend-item .trend-item-stats,
		.Trends .trend-location,
		.Footer-item,
		.metadata.social-context,
		h3,
		input,
		.with-icn,
		.QuoteTweet-screenname,
		.QuoteTweet-text,
		.DMActivity-title,
		.DMEmptyState-header,
		.ProfileHeading-toggleItem.is-active,
		.ProfileHeaderCard-locationText,
		.ProfileHeaderCard-joinDateText,
		.ProfileNav-item.is-active .ProfileNav-value,
		.ProfileNav-stat,
		.metadata,
		.global-nav .form-search,
		.bird-topbar-etched,
		#tweet-box-home-timeline,
		div.ProfileCardStats:nth-child(3) > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1),
		div.ProfileCardStats:nth-child(3) > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1),
		div.ProfileCardStats:nth-child(3) > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(3) > a:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(1),
		.btn,
		.u-textUserColorHover,
		.ProfileTweet-actionButton,
		.ProfileTweet-actionCount,
		.nav > li .Icon,
		.nav > li > a .text,
		.ProfileHeaderCard-location .Icon,
		.ProfileHeaderCard-url .Icon,
		.PhotoRail-heading .Icon,
		.ProfileHeaderCard-joinDate .Icon,
		.global-nav .search-icon .Icon,
		.ProfileHeaderCard-birthdateText,
		.ProfileHeaderCard-screenname > span,
		div.u-floatLeft,
		div.u-floatRight,
		.count > span,
		div.ProfileNameTruncated,
		.TweetImpressionsModule-heading,
		.MomentGuideVTwoCapsuleSummary-description.u-dir,
		.new-tweets-bar,
		.TweetTextSize.js-tweet-text.tweet-text,
		#tweet-box-global,
		.tagged-users,
		div.tweet-text.js-tweet-text,
		#tweet-box-global,
		#tweet-box-dm-conversation,
		span.js-display-url:hover,
		span.StreamsCategoryBar-itemName,
		.message-text,
		span.fullname,
		.PollXChoice-progress,
		.ProfileCard,
		span.profile-card-listName,
		.DMConversation-sendingStateIndicator,
		.tweet-box.rich-editor,
		.ProfileCardStats-statLabel,
		.typeahead-item.typeahead-account-item.js-selectable > a:hover,
		.typeahead-item.typeahead-topic-item > a:hover,
		.js-selectable.typeahead-accounts-shortcut.js-shortcut > a:hover,
    .btn-link.js-translate-tweet.translate-button.u-textUserColorHover:hover,	
		/*Moments start here*/
		.MomentUserByline-fullname,
		.MomentCapsuleCover-description.u-dir,
		.MomentShareTweetButton.js-momentShareTweet.MomentButton.MomentButton--gray,
		.MomentShareDMButton.js-momentShareDM.MomentButton.MomentButton--gray,
		.MomentFormatLink-title.u-dir,
		.MomentFormatLink-description.u-dir,
		.MomentCapsuleSummary-description.u-dir,
		.tfw.es.logged-in.ltr.nofooter.noloki.js div.bd span.field textarea,
		.recap-header.dismissible-content,
		.undo-action.u-textUserColor:hover,
		.search.advanced-search h1,
		.search.advanced-search span.td,
		a.twitter-atreply.pretty-link.js-nav:hover s,
		a.twitter-atreply.pretty-link.js-nav:hover b
			{ color: var(--text1) !important; }  
		
		/* link color */ 
		a,
		.TweetTextSize .twitter-atreply b,
		s,
		b,
		.account-group .fullname,
		.import-prompt p > span,
		.account-group .username,
		.DashboardProfileCard-statLabel,
		.Trends .context-trend-item .trend-item-context,
		.DMNotice-message,
		strong,
		.ProfileNav-item.is-active .ProfileNav-label,
		.ProfileNav-item.is-active:hover .ProfileNav-label,
		.ProfileNav-label,
		.ProfileUserList-permalink,
		a.u-textUserColor,
		.ProfileNav-item.is-active .ProfileNav-label,
		.btn-link,
		.dropdown-menu .dropdown-link,
		.MomentCapsuleSubtitle,
		#menu-0,
		span._timestamp.js-relative-timestamp,
		label,
		legend,
		span.js-display-url,
		.FacebookConnect-title,
		.FollowStatus,
		.TwitterCardsGrid-col--spacerNext.TwitterCardsGrid-float--prev.u-block.PollXChoice-footer--total,
		.TwitterCardsGrid-col--spacerNext.TwitterCardsGrid-float--prev.u-block,
		.TwitterCardsGrid-col--spacerNext.TwitterCardsGrid-float--prev.u-block.PollXChoice-footer--time,
		.PollingCardComposer-customDuration,
		.ProfileClusterFollow-title,
		.ProfileClusterFollow-closeButtonText.u-alignMiddle,
		.MomentCard-authorName,
		.MomentCard-authorScreenName,
		.DMTypeaheadHeader,
		.WtfLargeCarouselStreamItem-title,
		.list-explanation,
		.list-title.multiple-line,
		.ProfileTweet-actionButton.u-textUserColorHover.js-actionButton.js-actionReply:hover .ProfileTweet-actionCount,
		/*Moments start here*/
		.MomentCapsuleCover-title.u-dir,
		.MomentUserByline-username,
		.MomentFormatLink-url.u-dir,
		.undo-action.u-textUserColor
			{ color: var(--text2) !important; }  
		
		/* remove borders */
		.tweet,
		.module .flex-module,
		.wtf-module .import-prompt .cta,
		.top-timeline-tweetbox .timeline-tweet-box,
		.new-tweets-bar,
		.top-timeline-tweetbox .timeline-tweet-box .tweet-form.condensed .tweet-box,
		.global-nav .search-input,
		.QuoteTweet,
		.Trends,
		.module,
		.stream-item:not(.no-header-background-module),
		.content-main .expansion-container > .original-tweet-container,
		.DMActivity-header,
		.content-header .header-inner,
		.content-header,
		.stream-item-activity-notification,
		.stream-end,
		.ProfileHeading-content,
		.ProfileCanopy-navBar,
		.ProfileAvatar,
		.WhoToFollow.is-visible,
		.content-main .conversations-enabled .expansion-container .inline-reply-tweetbox,
		.conversations-enabled .inline-reply-caret,
		.conversations-enabled .inline-reply-caret .caret-inner,
		.tweet .stats,
		.stream-item .stats .avatar-row a:first-child,
		.dropdown-caret .caret-inner,
		.dropdown-menu li,
		.dismiss-module .dismiss-confirmation,
		.dismiss-module .feedback-action,
		.stream-end-item,
		.stream-end,
		.stream-loading,
		.stream-placeholder,
		.TwitterCard-container,
		div.SummaryCard-contentContainer,
		.permalink .inline-reply-tweetbox,
		.DashboardProfileCard-bg,
		div.RichEditor,
		.NewTweetButton,
		.user-actions-follow-button,
		.UserActions-editButton,
		.TweetImpressionsModule,
		.TweetImpressionsModule-xAxis,
		div.ProfileCard.js-actionable-user,
		li.active:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1),
		.js-nav-links > li:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1),
		.js-nav-links > li:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1),
		.dismiss-module,
		#stream-item-who_to_follow_entry-754957469835755520,
		.NotificationsHeadingContent,
		.stream-item-favorited_mention,
		.MomentGuideNavigation,
		div.MomentGuideVTwoCapsuleGroup,
		.modal-header,
		.AdaptiveFiltersBar,
		.AdaptiveFiltersBar-label,
		div.ComposerThumbnail,
		#tweet-box-home-timeline,
		button.DMInbox-toolbar,
		.DMConversation-composer,
		.DMComposer-container,
		div.DirectMessage-message::before,
		.content-inner,
		input,
		select,
		a.list-link.js-nav,
		a.list-link,
		button.submit,
		.StreamsTopBar,
		a.StreamsCategoryBar-item,
		div.MomentGuideVTwoCapsuleSummary,
		.StreamsFooter,
		.LoginDialog-footer,
		.global-nav,
    /*New Lines*/
    .ThreadedConversation-showMore,
    .ThreadedConversation-showMore::after,
    .js-profile-popup-actionable,
    .primary-btn,
		.TypingIndicatorMessageBubble.Caret.Caret--left::before,
		.view-other-link,
    .ThreadedConversation,
		.ThreadedConversation--loneTweet,
		.typeahead-items.typeahead-accounts.social-context.js-typeahead-accounts.block3.has-results,
		#notifications-optout-all-top,
		.find-friends-list > li,
		.muted-setting.js-actionable-user.account,
		.blocked-setting.js-actionable-user.account,
		/*.AppContent.wrapper.wrapper-settings > div div, 
		.AppContent.wrapper.wrapper-settings > div div > button,
		.content-main .stream-item > div,
		.AppContent.wrapper.wrapper-settings .content-main,*/
    .SummaryCard-image.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12,
		.SummaryCard-image.TwitterCardsGrid-float--prev,
		.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.PlayerCard-videoContainer,
		.FacebookConnect-actionButton,
		.content-main #apps-stream .stream-item .app,
		.content-main #apps-stream .stream-item .app button,
		.ProfileClusterFollow,
		.follow-bar.js-list-actions,
		.follow-bar.js-list-actions > a,
		.MomentCard-cover.TwitterCardsGrid-col--5,
		.FoundMediaSearch-query,
		.MomentFloatingMenu.is-fixed,
		.MomentFormatLink.MomentFormatLink--withText > a,
		.MomentCapsuleCover-media,
		.MomentsPermalinkPage-related,
		.AdaptiveRelatedSearches,
		.recap-header.dismissible-content,
		.SidebarFilterModule.is-collapsed.with-3-filters,
		.SidebarFilterModule.with-3-filters,
		.search.advanced-search,
		.SummaryCard-image.TwitterCardsGrid-col--6
		  { border: none !important; }
				
		.NewTweetButton,
		.DMButton,
		.user-actions-follow-button,
		div.ComposerThumbnail,
		#tweet-box-home-timeline,
		button.DMInbox-toolbar,
		.DMConversation-composer,
		.DMComposer-container,
		#global-new-tweet-button,
		button.tweet-action,
		button.submit,
		.FacebookConnect-actionButton
			{ box-shadow: none !important; }    		
		
		/* date color */
		.time,
		.LoginDialog-bird > span:nth-child(1)
			{ color: var(--text2) !important; }  
		
		
		/*Poll Colors*/
		span.PollXChoice-progress.tcu-textBold { color: var(--text2) !important; }
		
		span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="1"],
		span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="3"],
		span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="5"],
		span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="7"]
		  { background-color: var(--bg2) !important; }
		
	  span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="2"],
		span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="4"],
		span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="6"],
		span.PollXChoice-choice--chart[data-poll-index="8"]
		  { background-color: var(--accent) !important; }
		
		.PollingCardComposer-addOption.u-textUserColor,
		.PollingCardComposer-remove.u-textUserColor,
		.PollingCardComposer-defaultDuration.u-textUserColor
		  { color: var(--accent) !important; }
		
		.PollingCardComposer-pollDuration { border-top: none !important; }
		
		.PollingCardComposer-optionInput.is-singleLine.is-plainText.u-borderUserColorLightFocus
		  {
			  	color: var(--accent) !important;
				  border-color: var(--accent) !important;
				  box-shadow: var(--accent) !important;
		  }
		
		.btn.icon-btn.PollCreator-btn.js-tooltip.enabled,
    .btn.js-found-media-search-trigger.js-dropdown-toggle.icon-btn.js-tooltip.enabled,
		.btn.icon-btn.js-tooltip.enabled
		  { border-color: transparent !important; }
		
		.btn.icon-btn.PollCreator-btn.js-tooltip:hover,
		.btn.js-found-media-search-trigger.js-dropdown-toggle.icon-btn.js-tooltip:hover,
		.TweetBoxExtras-item.TweetBox-mediaPicker:hover
		  { border-color: var(--bg2) !important; }
		
		
		/*Hiding Editor*/
		.timeline-tweet-box { display: none !important; }
		
		/* f u c k */
		li.DMInbox-conversationItem > *
			{
				background: var(--bg1) !important;
				border: none !important;
				box-shadow: none !important;
			}
		
		/* buttons */
		.follow-btn.small-follow-btn,
		.follow-btn,
		.DashboardProfileCard-avatarImage,
		.modal-tweet-form-container
			{
				background: var(--bg2) !important;
				color: var(--text2) !important;
				border: 1px solid var(--bg2) !important;
				box-shadow: none !important;
				border: none !important;
			}    
		
		#global-tweet-dialog > div:nth-child(1)
			{
				opacity: 0.3 !important;
			}   
		

		
		.dismiss,
		.modal-tweet-form-container > form:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(2)
			{ color: var(--text2) !important; }  
		
		.modal-tweet-form-container > form:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > span:nth-child(2) { text-shadow: none !important; }  
		
		.tweet .time { float: right !important; }
		
		.tweet .time::before,
		.TweetBox-photoIntent > div:nth-child(1)/*,
		.home-tweet-box,
    .top-timeline-tweet-box-user-image*/
			{ display: none !important; }  
		
		.ProfileHeaderCard-screenname > span
			{
				text-transform: none !important;
				font-size: 14px !important;
			}  
		
		.username,
		.MomentCard-authorScreenName,
		.ProfileTweet-action.ProfileTweet-action--more.js-more-ProfileTweet-actions
			{
				opacity: 0 !important;
				transition: .2s ease-out !important;
			}
		
		.username:hover,
		.MomentCard-authorScreenName:hover,
		.stream-item-header:hover .ProfileTweet-action.ProfileTweet-action--more.js-more-ProfileTweet-actions
		  { opacity: 1 !important; }  
		
		
		
		/* hiding shit*/
		div.roaming-module,
		.Footer,
		.global-nav .search-icon .Icon,
		.InStreamLogin
			{ display: none !important; }
		
		.nav > li > a .text { opacity: 0 !important; }
				
		/* autohide stuff */
		div.Grid-cell,
		div.ComposerThumbnail
			{ background: transparent !important; }
		
		#global-nav-home,
		.people,
		.dm-nav,
		.moments
		 { max-width: 50px !important; }		
				
		/*No underline FFS*/
		a,
		a:hover,
		span.js-display-url,
		.undo-action.u-textUserColor:hover
		.btn-link.js-translate-tweet.translate-button.u-textUserColorHover,
		.btn-link.js-translate-tweet.translate-button.u-textUserColorHover:hover,
		a.twitter-atreply.pretty-link.js-nav:hover b
			{ text-decoration: none !important; }
		
		#global-tweet-dialog-dialog > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1),
		.page-canvas,
		.mobile,
		div.MomentGuideVTwoCapsuleSummary,
		#submit_button
			{ border-radius: 0px !important; }
		
		.global-nav .search-input
			{
				width: 500px !important;
				margin-left: 0px !important;
				opacity: 0 !important;  
			}
		
		.global-nav .search-input:hover { opacity: 0.9 !important; }
		
		.home-tweet-box,
		.global-nav
			{ box-shadow: 3px 3px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) !important; }
		
		
    .retweet-action { box-shadow: none !important; }
		
		.ProfileTweet-action--retweet .ProfileTweet-actionButton:hover,
		.ProfileTweet-action--retweet .ProfileTweet-actionButton:focus,
		.ProfileTweet-action--retweet .ProfileTweet-actionCount:hover,
		.ProfileTweet-action--retweet .ProfileTweet-actionCount:focus,
		.tweet.retweeted .ProfileTweet-action--retweet .Icon--retweet,
		.tweet.retweeted .ProfileTweet-action--retweet .ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo
		  { color: #1ace86 !important; }
		
		.ProfileTweet-action--reply .ProfileTweet-actionButton:hover,
		.ProfileTweet-action--more .ProfileTweet-actionButton:hover
		  { color: var(--text2) !important; }
		

		.QuoteTweet-link,
		.MomentFormatLink.MomentFormatLink--withText > a
		  {
		 	  box-shadow: 3px 4px 5px var(--bg2) !important;
		  	border-radius: 5px !important;
		  }
		
		/*Linked content shit*/
		
		.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCard-container.TwitterCard-container--clickable.SummaryCard--small.PlayerCard--preview:hover,
		.js-openLink.u-block.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCard-container.TwitterCard-container--clickable.SummaryCard--large:hover,
		.js-openLink.u-block.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCard-container.TwitterCard-container--clickable.SummaryCard--medium:hover,
		.js-openLink.u-block.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCard-container.TwitterCard-container--clickable.SummaryCard--small:hover,
		.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCard-container.TwitterCard-container--clickable.SummaryCard--large.PlayerCard--video:hover
		  { background-color: var(--bg2) !important; }
		
		.card2.js-media-container
		  {
				box-shadow: 3px 4px 5px var(--bg2) !important;
				padding-bottom: 0px !important;
				border-radius: 5px !important; 
		  }
		
	  .TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCardsGrid-col--spacerBottom.CardContent { margin-bottom: 0px !important; }
		
		.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12.TwitterCard-container.TwitterCard-container--clickable.SummaryCard--small.PlayerCard--preview
		  {
				background-color: var(--bg1) !important;
				margin-top: 4px !important;
				border-radius: 5px !important; 
		  }
		
		div.SummaryCard-contentContainer.TwitterCardsGrid-float--prev { background-color: transparent !important; }
		
		div.TwitterCardsGrid.TwitterCard.TwitterCard--animation { padding: 0px !important; }
				
		.js-macaw-cards-iframe-container.card-type-player { margin-bottom: -3px !important; }
		
		.SummaryCard-contentContainer.TwitterCardsGrid-col--12 { margin-top: 5px !important; }

		
		/*Antiguo morado
		background-color: #BF3EFF !important;*/
		
		.dm-new { background-color: transparent !important; }
		
		.count > span,
		.dm-new > span
			{
				opacity: 1 !important;
				border-width: 1px !important;
				margin: 1px 0px 0px 1px !important;
			  border-radius: 10px !important;
			} 
				
		.dm-new > span:nth-child(1),
		.count > span:nth-child(1)
		  {
				background-color: var(--accent) !important;
				border-color: var(--bg1) !important;
				color: var(--bg1) !important;
		  }
		
		.count.new-count { background-color: transparent !important; }
		
		.home.active { background-color: var(--accent) !important; }
		
		.home > a,
		.people > a,
		.dm-nav > a
		  { border-color: var(--accent) !important; }
		
		li#global-nav-home.home.new::before { color: var(--accent) !important; }
		
		.t1-form.form-horizontal.requires-password > hr,
		.t1-form.form-horizontal.notifications-form > hr
		 { display: none !important; }
		
		.content-main #apps-stream .stream-item .app .content { padding-right: 10% !important; }
		
		
		/*Thread Convo Lines*/
		
		.ThreadedConversation { margin: 0px !important; }
		
		.ThreadedConversation-tweet::before,
		.ThreadedConversation-tweet::after,
		.ThreadedConversation-unavailableTweet::before,
		.ThreadedConversation-unavailableTweet::after,
		.ThreadedConversation-viewOther::before,
		.permalink-inner.permalink-tweet-container.ThreadedConversation.ThreadedConversation--permalinkTweetWithAncestors::before
		  {
				background-color: var(--accent) !important;
				margin: 1.6% 0% -2% -2.6% !important;
		  }
		
		.ThreadedConversation-unavailableTweet::before {height: 100% !important; }
		
		.conversation-module .conversation-tweet-item::after,
		.original-tweet-item.last-navigable-stream-item::before,
		.conversation-ancestor.conversation-tweet-item::before,
		.home.active.new::before,
		.missing-tweets-bar::before,
		.missing-tweets-bar::after
		  {
				background-color: var(--accent) !important;
				margin: 2.25% 0% -3% 1.25% !important;
		  }
		
		.conversation-ancestor.conversation-tweet-item::before
		  {
				height: 8% !important;
				margin-top: 0% !important;
				z-index: 20 !important;
		  }
		
		.conversation-ancestor.conversation-tweet-item.selected-stream-item::before
		  {
			  background-color: var(--accent) !important;
        height: 16% !important;
				margin-top: 0% !important;
		  }
		
		.conversation-root.conversation-tweet-item.first-navigable-stream-item::after { margin-top: 1.8% !important; }
		
		.original-tweet-item.last-navigable-stream-item.selected-stream-item::before { margin-top: 0% !important; height: 18% !important; }
		
		.missing-tweets-bar::after
		  {
				height: 130% !important;
				margin-top: -1% !important;
		  }
			
		.vellip,
		span.vellip::before,
		span.vellip::after
		 { display: none !important; }
		
		
		/*Selected tweet colours*/
				
		li.js-stream-item.stream-item.stream-item.selected-stream-item,
		.conversation-root.conversation-tweet-item.first-navigable-stream-item.selected-stream-item,
		.original-tweet-item.last-navigable-stream-item.selected-stream-item,
		.conversation-ancestor.conversation-tweet-item.selected-stream-item,
		.conversation-header.first-navigable-stream-item.selected-stream-item,
		.missing-tweets-bar.selected-stream-item
		  { box-shadow: 0 0 0px 3px var(--accent) !important; }
		
		
		
		/*Menu colors*/
		
		.dropdown-menu li > a:hover,
    .dropdown-menu li > a:focus,
    .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link:hover,
    .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link:focus,
    .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link.is-focused,
    .dropdown-menu li:hover .dropdown-link,
    .dropdown-menu li:focus .dropdown-link,
    .dropdown-menu .typeahead-recent-search-item.selected,
    .dropdown-menu .typeahead-saved-search-item.selected,
    .dropdown-menu .selected a,
    .dropdown-menu .dropdown-link.selected,
		.current-user:hover .metadata		
	  	{
				background-color: var(--accent) !important;
		    color: var(--bg1) !important;
		  }
		
		/*Moments fixed*/
		/*Button*/
		.MomentShareTweetButton.js-momentShareTweet.MomentButton.MomentButton--blue { background-color: var(--bg1); border: none; color: var(--accent); }	
		
		.current-user:hover .fullname { color: var(--bg2) !important; }
		
		.preview-message .Icon--me { color: var(--accent) !important; }
		
		.TweetBoxExtras-item .TweetBox-mediaPicker:hover { box-shadow: var(--text1) !important; }
		            
		.tfw.es.logged-in.ltr.nofooter.noloki.js { border: none !important; }
		
		.ProfileTweet-action.ProfileTweet-action--more.js-more-ProfileTweet-actions {margin-right: 1% !important; }
		
		/*Advanced search shit*/
		
		.search.advanced-search { text-shadow: none !important; }
		
		.search.advanced-search input:focus { box-shadow: 0 0 0px 1px var(--accent) !important; }
		
		.datepicker-days:not(.disabled),
		.datepicker-days:not(.new)
		  { color: var(--accent) !important; }
		
		
	}
